channel.title: Comments on: WordPress 2.8.1 â€“ XML-RPC and AtomPub Changes

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/07/10/wordpress-2-8-1-xml-rpc-and-atompub-changes/#comment-2841">Robertd</a>.
What does the XML-RPC response from the server look like?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Robertd.

What does the XML-RPC response from the server look like?

item.title: By: Robertd
item.dc:creator: Robertd
item.description:
I am still getting this error when trying to upload pics
The response to the metaWeblog.newMediaObject method received from the blog server was invalid:
Invalid response document returned from XmlRpc server
It was working in 2.7 fianlly but now here we go again with 2.8.1
item.content:encoded:
I am still getting this error when trying to upload pics

The response to the metaWeblog.newMediaObject method received from the blog server was invalid:

Invalid response document returned from XmlRpc server

It was working in 2.7 fianlly but now here we go again with 2.8.1
